title: About
ps: Elm is a good wood for making longbows. A crossbow is a particularly powerful bow. XosBow is a particularly powerful blogging framework, made with Elm and HtmlTemplate.
Page content and templates are currently written in JSON. I'm planning to soon add Markdown for simple text pages and a Lisp-like syntax for code.
The "index" link in the sidebar goes to the index page, as does clicking on the site name at the top of the page.
The "play" link in the sidebar goes to a page where you can enter JSON strings and see how they parse and evaluate.
The "docs" link in the sidebar goes to the index of the XosBow user documentation.
The "templates", "pages", "settings", and "stylesheets" links in the sidebar can be used to inspect the JSON and CSS that define this site.
The "[Page JSON]" link at the bottom of each page shows the JSON source for the current page.
Clicking a page title on the index page will go to that page.
